thread.section_title: Stellar Data Recovery Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Stellar Data Recovery Inc. | www.stellarinfo.com
thread.title: Mikael Aji Bagaskara
thread.title_full: Stellar Data Recovery Inc. reviewed by Mikael Aji Bagaskara

author: Mikael Aji Bagaskara
title: Mikael Aji Bagaskara
text:
The software did not work at all for me and then I asked for refund.
Quite stressful for me to assured them that the software was really useless for me. But after several complaints and days they agreed to give me refund. And now I am waiting for 3-4 days to receive that back.
Thanks!
